Developer API Documentation

Backup
  • Intro
  • List all accounts
  • Get a single account
  • Add an email account
  • Update an email account
  • Delete an email account
Migrate
  • Intro
  • List all migrates
  • Start a migrate
  • Get a single migrate
Restore
  • Intro
  • List all restores
  • Start a restore
  • Get a single restore
Messages
  • Intro
  • List all mailboxes
  • List all messages
  • Return an email message
  • Search for terms in the emails
Contacts
  • Intro
  • List all contacts of an account
  • Return a contact
Messages
  • Intro
  • List all attachments
  • Return an attachment
  • Search for attachments

Contacts API

Contacts API allows you to download contacts

List Contacts

List the contacts for the accounts.

GET /v1/accounts/:account_id/contacts

Parameters

page

As the number of contacts can be big, we use pagination for the API. The page parameter denotes the page number. If this is omitted, it will default to the first page. The numbering will start from 1.

default: 1

per_page

You may specify the number of contacts to return in a page. The number is capped at 40 contacts.

range: 1 - 40 default: 20

sort

  • name
  • email

default: name

direction
  • asc
  • desc

default: asc

Scope

contact

Response

{
    "count": 27,
    "start": 0,

Get a single contact

Get a contact from the account. It will return a file in .vcard format. The response will be encoded in Base 64.

GET /v1/accounts/:account_id/contacts/:id

Scope

contact

Response

Base 64 encoded .vcard file.
